alert.note: Alert for Brown; Cass; Morgan; Schuyler (Illinois) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Central Illinois (Central and East Central Illinois)
info.headline: Flood Warning issued April 16 at 6:47PM CDT until April 17 at 12:57AM CDT by NWS Central Illinois
info.description: ...The Flood Warning continues for the following rivers in Illinois... Illinois River at Beardstown affecting Morgan, Schuyler, Brown and Cass Counties. Illinois River near Havana affecting Mason, Cass and Fulton Counties. .The following forecasts are based on observed precipitation, soil moisture conditions, and forecast precipitation. Additional information is available at www.weather.gov. ...FLOOD WARNING NOW IN EFFECT UNTIL JUST AFTER MIDNIGHT TONIGHT... * WHAT...Minor flooding is occurring. * WHERE...Illinois River at Beardstown. * WHEN...Until just after midnight tonight. * IMPACTS...At 14.0 feet, Minor flooding begins to agricultural areas not protected by levees. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS... - At 5:45 PM CDT Sunday the stage was 14.0 feet. - Recent Activity...The maximum river stage in the 24 hours ending at 5:45 PM CDT Sunday was 14.4 feet. - Forecast...The river is expected to fall below flood stage this evening and continue falling to 11.6 feet Sunday evening. - Flood stage is 14.0 feet. - http://www.weather.gov/safety/flood && Fld Observed Forecasts (7 pm CDT) Location Stg Stg Day/Time Mon Tue Wed Illinois River Beardstown 14.0 14.0 Sun 5 pm CDT 13.7 13.4 13.1 &&
info.instruction: Persons with interests along this river need to prepare for flooding. Stay tuned for further updates on this flooding situation.
